data.text: Ɛda no, Debora ne Abinoam babarima Barak too saa dwom yi:
“Israel mpanimfoɔ sɔre dii animu,
“Mo ahemfo, montie!
“Awurade, ɛberɛ a wofirii Seir,
Awurade ba no maa mmepɔ wosoeɛ.
“Anat ba Samgar ne Yael berɛ so,
Nnipa kakra na wɔkaa Israel nkuraaseɛ
Ɛberɛ a Israel somm anyame foforɔ no,
Mewɔ Israel ntuanofoɔ afa
“Mo a motete afunumu a wɔte apɔ so,
Montie nkuraaseɛ nnwomsiaafoɔ a wɔaboa wɔn ho ano wɔ anomeeɛ.
‘Sɔre! Debora, sɔre!
“Nkaeɛfoɔ no bɔɔ nsra firi Tabor kɔɔ ahoɔdenfoɔ so.
Wɔfiri Efraim baeɛ, asase a na kane no na ɛyɛ Amalekfoɔ dea,
Na Isakar mu atitire ka Debora ne Barak ho.
Adɛn enti na wotenaa efie wɔ nnwanhwɛfoɔ mu,
Gilead kaa Yordan apueeɛ hɔ.
Nanso, Sebulon too ne nkwa akyerɛ
“Kanaan ahemfo koeɛ wɔ Taanak a ɛbɛn Megido nsutire ho,
Nsoromma firi soro koeɛ.
Asubɔnten Kison twee wɔn kɔeɛ,
Afei, apɔnkɔ no tɔte pempem fam,
‘Nnome nka Merosfoɔ,’ Awurade ɔbɔfoɔ na ɔseɛ.
“Nhyira nka Yael,
Sisera srɛɛ nsuo,
Afei, ɔde ne nsa benkum yii ntomadan pɛɛwa,
Ɔhodwoeɛ, ɔhwee ase;
“Sisera nena hwɛɛ mpomma mu;
Ne mmaa anyansafoɔ no rema mmuaeɛ no,
‘Wɔrekyɛ asadeɛ a wɔnyaeɛ no,
“Awurade, ma wʼatamfoɔ nyinaa nwu sɛ Sisera!
